tags.description:
`hex-picker`
`Choose a color by hex or rgba code`

  * `value` {`string`} - 

  * `disabled` {`boolean`} - 

Properties:

  * `value` {`string`} - 

  * `_rValue` {`number`} - 

  * `_gValue` {`number`} - 

  * `_bValue` {`number`} - 

  * `_oValue` {`number`} - 

  * `disabled` {`boolean`} -
